gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 109, Heat 105
gameRecap.excerpt: Philadelphia ends the game on a 15-3 run to defeat Miami, 109-105. For Philadelphia, Tyrese Maxey led the way with 37 points, nine rebounds, and 11 assists while aided by Joel Embiid (29 points, four rebounds) and Kelly Oubre (18 points, eight rebounds) in the victory. Terry Rozier finished with 22 points with Jimmy Butler adding 20 points and five assists for Miami in the losing effort. Philadelphia improves to 42-35, while Miami moves to 42-34 in the loss.
